title: Spell Checker
description: A web app that highlights misspelled words using a Basic English dictionary. Users can add words temporarily and see results instantly.

title: Days Calendar
description: A lightweight calendar that helps visualize and manage day-based tasks, useful for tracking routines or learning schedules.

title: Spaced Repetition Tracker
description: A tool to help with spaced repetition-based learning. Built for learners who want to retain knowledge over time.

title: TV Show Explorer
description: An interactive app that fetches data from a TV show API to display episodes, descriptions, and search features.
